subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: David Pastrnak, Boston’s first-round draft pick in 2014, scored twice for the second straight game, and Milan Lucic had a goal and an assist as the Bruins earned their fourth straight win.
snippet: David Pastrnak, Boston’s first-round draft pick in 2014, scored twice for the second straight game, and Milan Lucic had a goal and an assist as the Bruins earned their fourth straight win.
